Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Story
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the initial introduction of Paul Bunyan in a circus, the arrival of the circus in town, and the subsequent disruption caused by Matto Grasso's vengeful acts and Paul Bunyan's heroic interventions.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Introduction and Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan and the arrival of the circus in town, setting the stage for the unfolding events.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the man's intervention in Billings' threat and the subsequent violent attack, escalating the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Threat with a Pistol and Injury

sub_scenes.title: Explanation and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves the Circus Owner explaining the backstory of Matto Grasso and offering Paul Bunyan a job, setting up Paul's new role in the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of Matto Grasso and Invitation to the Circus
Job Offer as the New Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Revenge and Fire
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Matto Grasso's escalating revenge plan, culminating in setting the circus tent on fire and Paul Bunyan's intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Performance and Matto Grasso's Envy
Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico Release and Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's second act of revenge by releasing Gigantico and the ensuing chase and chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Foul Deed: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico Escapes and the Pursuit Begins

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Attacks in Arena
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Matto Grasso's chase and attacks within the circus arena, escalating his attempts to cause mayhem.

sub_scenes.title: Strongman Fight and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the strongman fight, its dramatic climax with the trapeze throw, and the subsequent intervention by authorities and job offer to Paul Bunyan.

narrative_arcs.title: Job Offer and North Woods Rejection

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's fantastical adventure, his encounter with the Ogress of Tibet, and his acquisition of a magic dagger, leading him to a city in mourning and a new quest.

sub_scenes.title: Ogress Introduction and Severed Head Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo's adventure and simultaneously presents a mysterious severed head discovery, creating parallel storylines.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Discovery of the Severed Talking Head
The Severed Head's Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Journey and Ogress's Trap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Marco Polo's journey, his rescue of a tied man and acquisition of a magic dagger, leading to a deceptive encounter with the Ogress.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Rescues a Tied Man and Receives a Magic Dagger
Marco Polo Meets the King of Hi-toun and Learns of Princess Lotus's Disappearance
The Woman in Distress and the Witch's Castle
Entering the Castle and the Ogress's Trap
Combat with Monstrous Rats and Defiance Against the Ogress

Major_Arcs.title: Swordsman and Ogre Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of a swordsman captured by a villain and then imprisoned by an Ogre, ultimately escaping using a magic blade.

sub_scenes.title: Capture of Swordsman and Imprisonment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes the swordsman's capture by a villain and subsequent imprisonment by an Ogre, setting up his desperate situation.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the escape from the Ogre using a hidden blade and the subsequent reunion with the woman's father, concluding this episode.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to the Father

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra Story
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of betrayal, revenge, and treasure, framed by a Treasure Keeper's narration and unfolding in a British penal colony and later in England.

sub_scenes.title: Penal Colony Setup and Treasure Deal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Treasure Keeper as narrator and sets up the scene in a penal colony where a prisoner proposes a treasure deal for freedom.

narrative_arcs.title: The Map and the Escape Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Revenge Vow
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the Captain's betrayal and the Lieutenant's vow for revenge, setting the stage for a long-term pursuit.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Escape
Furious Denial and Vow of Revenge
Years Later: Release and Return to England

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Resolution in England
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's vigil, the confrontation with Captain Brooking, and the violent resolution in Brooking's home.

narrative_arcs.title: Jordan's Vigil and Brooking's Unaware Planning
Journey to the Attic and Betrayal
Police Respond to Gunshot and Find Wounded Man
Police Observation and Call for Homicide Squad

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx as he is consulted about the haunted Matthews Estate and his confrontation with the vengeful spirit of Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Investigation Request
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and the problem of the haunted Matthews Estate, setting up the investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Ominous Warning at Matthews Estate

sub_scenes.title: Haunted House Confrontation and Combat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dr. Styx's entry into the haunted house, his confrontation with Vincent Matthews, and their ensuing combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Disregarding the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

Major_Arcs.title: The Forgiveness of Rosalind
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores a moral tale about violence, fear, and salvation through forgiveness, focusing on a cloaked man guiding a seated man to seek forgiveness from his murdered sister, Rosalind.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Revelation of Murder
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene initiates the moral dilemma, with a cloaked man confronting a seated man about violence and revealing the need for forgiveness from his murdered sister.

narrative_arcs.title: Admission of Fear and Search for Salvation
The Sister's Forgiveness and Murder Revelation

sub_scenes.title: Forced Confrontation and Supernatural Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the cloaked man forcing the man in white to confront Rosalind's spirit, leading to her summoning and arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoning of Rosalind and Her Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Forgiveness and Brotherly Love Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Rosalind granting forgiveness and expressing brotherly love, resolving the seated man's torment and leading to a peaceful departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Request for Forgiveness and its Granting
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the historical voyages of Henry Hudson, his quest for the Northwest Passage, and the tragic mutiny that ended his explorations.

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage Proposition and Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the historical context of Henry Hudson's voyages and details his first voyage attempt for the Northwest Passage and his return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition
Weeks at Sea and Talk of Mutiny
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Reflection and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Ice Trap, and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hudson's second voyage, the ship getting trapped in ice, and the eventual mutiny by the crew.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage for the Northern Passage
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement on Course

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Rescue of the Princess
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Arabian Knight, Hassan, on his mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from the Tartar leader, Kurgan, culminating in a duel and a romantic reward.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Briefing and Journey to Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up Hassan's mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter and details his initial journey towards the Tartar camp.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Warning and Revelation at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Camp Infiltration and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's infiltration of the Tartar camp, his encounters with sentries, and his discovery of the captive princess's location.

sub_scenes.title: Combat and Duel for Freedom
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the escalating combat upon Hassan's discovery and culminates in the duel proposed by Kurgan to decide the princess's fate.

sub_scenes.title: The Duel and Romantic Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the duel itself, Hassan's victory, and the romantic aftermath with the Princess as a reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Swift Defeat of the First Opponent
